# Gallery Albums Data
# Format:
# Album: Title
# Category: engagement|travel|dates|family|friends|special_moments|proposal|wedding_prep|behind_scenes|professional
# Date: YYYY-MM-DD (optional)
# Location: City, State (optional)
# Featured: yes/no (optional, defaults to no)
# Description: Custom description (optional, auto-generated if not provided)
# - /path/to/image1.jpg | Optional caption
# - /path/to/image2.jpg | Another caption
# - /path/to/video.mp4 | Video caption
# (blank line to separate albums)

# Example:
Album: Viagem para Gramado
Category: travel
Date: 2024-08-15
Location: Gramado, RS
Featured: yes

- /Users/helrabelo/Downloads/gramado2.jpg | Rua Coberta
- /Users/helrabelo/Downloads/gramado3.jpg | Mini Mundo
